Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are still standing at Garfield due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are still standing at Garfield due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #29 State buses
  • #55 Garfield buses
  • Green Line trains

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
